## The Developer (AKA: Me)

#### Personal Info
Caique Rodrigues Peixoto  
Born on September 29, 1992  

###### Contact
[caiquepeixoto1@gmail.com](caiquepeixoto1@gmail.com)  
[caique@loopec.com.br](caique@loopec.com.br)

#### Academic Background:
* 2010 – Present: Software Engineering – 6º Semester – University of Brasília
* 2010 – Present: IT Management – 4º Semester – UniSEB

#### At present:
* Building killers Ruby and Java applications at [Loop EC](http://loopec.com.br)
* Building killers Android applications at [Desafio Positivo](https://www.concursoideiapp.com.br/)
* Building a test framework for Android based on [Robolectric](http://pivotal.github.com/robolectric/)
* Learning in details [EmberJS](http://emberjs.com/)
* Learning in details [JasmineJS](http://pivotal.github.com/jasmine/)
* Eagerly waiting for season 3 of [Game of Thrones](http://www.hbo.com/#/game-of-thrones)
* Watching [How I Met Your Mother](http://www.cbs.com/shows/how_i_met_your_mother/).
* Being legen...wait for it...dary!
